data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 5,170 believers in Ciales, Puerto Rico a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ciales, Puerto Rico

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 5,170 believers in Ciales against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Ciales, Puerto Rico.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Ciales a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Ciales
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Ciales, Ciales, Puerto Rico.
Father, help your children in Ciales, Puerto Rico find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Father, help the 5,170 believers in Ciales to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Ciales, Puerto Rico.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.
